July 27, 1899 D Grimsby Contest
Grimsby Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
grimsby
Test Piece Contest
Donizetti [arr. Rimmer]
Vicarage Grounds, Grimsby
1st prize £12. 2nd prize £10. 3rd prize £5. 4th prize £2.10s. 5th prize £1 divided between East Kirkby United and Handsworth Woodhouse.
March contest 1st (£1) Hucknall Excelsior, 2nd (10s.) Lincoln Malleable.
8 bands competed.
April 15, 2012, 2:57 p.m. Jan. 5, 2015, 8:53 p.m.
